BaseJiangConrathMeasure - Class in hesml.measures.impl
This class implements some common functions used by all the measures derived from the Jiang-Conrath distance.
BaseJiangConrathMeasure(ITaxonomy) - Constructor for class hesml.measures.impl.BaseJiangConrathMeasure
Standard constructor
BenchmarkCrossCorpusICModelMeasures - Class in hesml.benchmarks.impl
This class implements a set of cross-validation benchmarks by computing the correlation values for the experimental matrix defined by the Cartesian product of a set of corpus-based IC models versus a set of IC-based similarity measures.
BenchmarkCrossCorpusICModelMeasures(IWordNetDB, ITaxonomy, CorrelationOutputMetrics, String, String[], String, CorpusBasedICModelType, SimilarityMeasureType[]) - Constructor for class hesml.benchmarks.impl.BenchmarkCrossCorpusICModelMeasures
Cosntructor
BenchmarkCrossCorpusICModels - Class in hesml.benchmarks.impl
This class implements a set of cross-validation benchmarks by computing the correlation values for the experimental matrix defined by the Cartesian product of a set of corpus-based IC models versus a set of IC-based similarity measures.

BenchmarkCrossICModelMeasures - Class in hesml.benchmarks.impl
This class implements a set of cross-validation benchmarks by computing the correlation values for the experimental matrix defined by the Cartesian product of a set of intrinsic IC models versus a set of IC-based similarity measures.

BenchmarkFactory - Class in hesml.benchmarks.impl
The main aim of this class is to instantiate all the benchmarks in order to hide them to the client code.

BenchmarkMultipleDatasets - Class in hesml.benchmarks.impl
This class implements a set of benchmarks of specific similarity measures (rows) with different datasets and WordNet versions (columns).

BenchmarkNonICMultiMeasures - Class in hesml.benchmarks.impl
This class implements a set of word similarity benchmarks for all similarity measures which are not based on an IC model.

Constructor
BenchmarkSingleICmeasure - Class in hesml.benchmarks.impl
This class evaluates one single IC-based similarity measure with a collection of intrinsic IC models and returns the matrix of Pearson correlation values.

Constructor with a single IC model

The aim of this class is to generate the Synset pair info files included in our WNSimRep dataset.

This class implements the ICg model introduced in the paper below.

buildICmodelFileNames() - Method in class hesml.benchmarks.impl.BenchmarkCrossCorpusICModels
This function builds a vector of strings with the names of the IC models plus the WordNet-based frquency file used in their computation.

This function builds an IC model using the Resnik method.
